promocodes.set_error: Promo code not added, invalid promo code.
promocodes.sets_error: No promo codes added, no valid promo codes.

set_success_suffix._tickets: successfully added to the Personal Account. When buying tickets, the promo code is applied automatically. The discount amount and promo code are displayed in the cart
set_success_suffix._goods: successfully added to the Personal Account. When buying goods, the promotional code is applied automatically. The amount of the discount and the promotional code are displayed in the basket

sets_success_suffix._tickets: Successfully added to the Personal Account. When buying tickets, promo codes are applied automatically. The discount amount and promo code are displayed in the cart
sets_success_suffix._goods: Successfully added to the Personal Account. Promo codes are applied automatically when purchasing goods. The discount amount and promo code are displayed in the cart

success.title: Payment was successful
success.description: Your Payment was successful. Your transaction has been completed, and tickets have been emailed to you

fail.description: Sorry, your payment failed. No charges were made.
